title: Kerala School of Mathematics, Kozhikode
summary: The Kerala School of Mathematics (KSoM) in Kozhikode, India is a research institute in Theoretical sciences with a focus on Mathematics. The institute is a joint venture of the  Department of Atomic Energy (DAE) and the Kerala State Council for Science, Technology and Environment (KSCSTE).[1]  Kerala School of Mathematics is a center of advanced research and learning in Mathematics and is a meeting ground for leading Mathematicians from around the world.
